lines.name: Benji
lines.text: Gotcha!  Not that you could really avoid it.

lines.name: Frankie
lines.text: Yeah, real funny.  Can you let me down now?

lines.name: Benji
lines.text: A master thief has to be a master escape artist too.  [b]Interact[/b] with the trap (the F key) to start chewing yourself free.
